data: By Dessi Gomez Dessi Gomez SEO Staff Writer @GomezDessi More Stories By Dessi “Bridgerton” Stars Ruth Gemmell And Daniel Francis On Violet’s “Really Valid” Monologue And The “Patient Exploration” Of Their Characters’ Relationship In Season 4 Part 1 ‘Bridgerton’ Season 4 Star Katie Leung Reflects On Araminta’s Feelings Toward Sophie & Bringing Out Humanity In Evil Stepmother Role ‘Bridgerton’ Stars Adjoa Andoh And Golda Rosheuvel Talk “Costly” Tension Between Queen Charlotte And Lady Danbury In Season 4 Part 1 View All January 29, 2026 12:41pm L-R: Yao, Jason Tobin, Quincy Isaiah, Jefferson White, and Tayme Thapthimthong Thomas Brunot/Getty/Phil Chester and Sara Byrnes/Coty Tarr/Getty Lionsgate ’s origin story John Rambo has begun production in Bangkok, Thailand, adding five more to the cast led by Noah Centineo. Rounding out the ensemble are yao ( Sinners ), Jason Tobin ( A Thousand Blows ), Quincy Isaiah ( Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty ), Jefferson White (Y ellowstone ), and Tayme Thapthimthong ( The White Lotus ). Related Stories News AGBO Boards Lionsgate & Millennium Media’s ‘John Rambo’ Acquisitions Netflix Eyeing Legendary’s Live-Action ‘Gundam’ Movie Starring Sydney Sweeney & Noah Centineo John Rambo takes audiences back, years before the events of First Blood , diving deep into the roots and experiences that forged one of the big screen’s most enduring and complex characters. Thapthmthong portrayed Gaitok the security guard in Season 3 of The White Lotus . Isaiah was Magic Johnson in Winning Time . Jefferson White, who portrayed Jimmy Hurdstrom in Yellowstone , will also appear in The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping this fall. yao starred in Ryan Coogler’s Sinners as Bo Chow. Watch on Deadline Noah Centineo (the upcoming Street Fighter ) stars as the one-man fighting force, under the direction of Jalmari Helander ( Sisu, Sisu: Road to Revenge ). The film’s screenplay is by Rory Haines and Sohrab Noshirvani ( Black Adam, The Mauritanian ), and the film is produced by Kevin King Templeton and Les Weldon ( Rambo & Expendables franchises), Jonathan Yunger ( Rambo: Last Blood , Expend4bles ) for Millennium Media, Michael Disco ( San Andreas, Rampage ) and Angela Russo-Otstot ( Extraction, The Gray Man ) for AGBO. Executive Producers include Anthony & Joe Russo ( Avengers, Captain America ), Trevor Short ( Expendables franchise) for Millennium Media, Dallas Sonnier ( Bone Tomahawk, The Pendragon Cycle: Rise of the Merlin ) and Amanda Presmyk ( Dragged Across Concrete, Run Hide Fight ) for Bonfire Legend. The film will be distributed by Lionsgate. RELATED: Gabriel Basso Making Directorial Debut With Thriller ‘Iconoclast’; Will Star Opposite Courtney Eaton, Noah Centineo & Rain Spencer “We’re thrilled to start production on John Rambo , which will allow both new audiences and existing fans to explore John Rambo’s roots, his principles, and most importantly, some incredible action, courtesy of Jalmari’s singular vision,” Erin Westerman, president of the Lionsgate Motion Picture Group, said. “And we’re so excited for Noah’s committed and powerful performance to show what forged this character into legend.” yao is represented by Stewart Talent, Luber Roklin Entertainment, and the Peikoff Mahan Law Office. Tobin is represented by Paradigm, the Artists Partnership, and Anonymous Content. Isaiah is represented by CAA and JTWAMM. White is represented by Gersh, Principal Entertainment LA, and Lichter, Grossman, Nichols, Feldman, Rogal, Shikora & Clark. Thapthimthong is represented by Gersh, International Talent Group, and Artist International Group.
